conversational memory network ( CMN ).from sentence: We propose a conversational memory network ( CMN ) , which uses a multimodal approach for emotion detection in utterances ( a unit of speech bound by breathes or pauses ) of such conversational videos .

by using.from sentence: Our proposed CMN incorporates these factors by using emotional context information present in the conversation history .

speakerbased emotion modeling.from sentence: It improves speakerbased emotion modeling by using memory networks which are efficient in capturing long - term dependencies and summarizing task - specific details using attention models .

memory cells.from sentence: Specifically , the memory cells of CMN are continuous vectors that store the context information found in the utterance histories .

models.from sentence: CMN also models interplay of these memories to capture interspeaker dependencies .

extracts.from sentence: CMN first extracts multimodal features ( audio , visual , and text ) for all utterances in a video .
